name: DnxPublishWebJobToAzure
friendlyName: DNX - Publish Web Job to Azure
description: Publish a DNX console application as a web job in Azure.
author: Brandon Martinez

inputs.name: AzureWebJobPath
inputs.label: Web Job Approot Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the folder containing your web job executable approot.

inputs.name: AzureWebJobName
inputs.label: Web Job Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the web job to deploy.

inputs.name: AzureWebJobType
inputs.label: Web Job Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of web job to deploy.

inputs.name: AzureTargetWebApps
inputs.label: Azure Target Web App(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure web apps to deploy web job. Put additional web apps on separate lines.

inputs.name: AzureTargetWebAppSlotName
inputs.label: Azure Target Web App Slot Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The slot to deploy the web job to.

instanceNameFormat: DNX - Publish Web Job to Azure: $(AzureWebJobName)
